name: KUMO NO IRO
description:
Join the soon to be Bard Ongaku on his path towards the big golden city.

As you both progress on your journey, you come across mythical creatures and dreamy scenery.

Kumo no Iro is a laid back game, made for exploring the floaty world you find yourself in. You jump from island to island whilst solving small puzzles.

Credits

This game was made with Unreal Engine 4.

Sounds and music are from the websites Weloveindies and Epidemicsound.
